tool_description: Identifies, classifies, and handles shipping exceptions and anomalies in return tracking.

tracking_events.description: Array of tracking events to analyze for exceptions

expected_delivery_date.description: Expected delivery date for delay detection

escalation_threshold_hours.description: Hours after which to escalate unresolved exceptions (1-720)

error_messages: Invalid tracking events: Tracking events array cannot be empty and must contain valid event descriptions.
Return ID not found: The specified return_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid escalation threshold: escalation_threshold_hours must be between 1 and 720 hours.
Exception processing failed: Unable to process exceptions due to system error.
usage: Provide tracking_events and return_id, optionally specify expected_delivery_date and escalation_threshold_hours.

exceptions_found.description: List of identified exceptions or anomalies

recommended_action.description: Recommended action to resolve the exceptions

estimated_resolution_hours.description: Estimated hours to resolve the exception
